price: It is He Who created the night and the day, the sun and the moon – each floating in its orbit.
arabic: وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِي خَلَقَ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ وَٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَۖ كُلّٞ فِي فَلَكٖ يَسۡبَحُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
